name: Pumpkin Log
ingredients: 1 cup powdered sugar ½ tsp. vanilla
1 8 oz. package cream cheese Mix together and spread
steps: ¾ cup flour ½ tsp salt
Beat eggs high speed for 5 minutes with lemon juice. Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs, then add pumpkin mix.
Bake for 15 min. Spread on dishcloth that is sprinkled with powdered sugar. Roll, freeze 5-­‐10 minutes. Unroll.
Put cream cheese mixture on. Reroll and freeze with Saran wrap or foil on it. Serve semi-­‐frozen.
